name: Beat Leap: An addictive, mind bending game of wits, reflexes, rhythm, music & creativity
name_original: Beat Leap: An addictive, mind bending game of wits, reflexes, rhythm, music & creativity
description:
Beat Leap is a critically acclaimed, minimal game that is part stealth puzzler, part rhythm tapper.

According to the critics - "I absolutely love it when a developer has taken the time and initiative to create something fresh and original, and this is especially good to see in the Games category of the App Store." -App Picker Review

"Beat Leap is a top-notch development with some awesome tunes and an insanely addictive style of gameplay, so I would definitely recommend taking it for a spin!"

Beat Leap combines music, stealth and puzzle in a beautifully designed package that tests your wits and reflexes while providing endless hours of FUN.

Move with the rhythm of the heart as you capture mini hearts in over 100 clever puzzle based levels.

Sync your movements with the beat and make your way across while surviving a variety of enemies and obstacles in this ultimate stealth, rhythm, puzzle game.

Can your wits help you survive the obstacles that come along your way ....
or will you get caught up with the beat?

Take the leap to try this beat!

* A simple, yet slick, interface. Easy to play, hard to stop!

* Over 100 challenging levels designed to test your mind.

* LEVEL DESIGNER!

* Countless hours of superb gameplay & sharp puzzles

* Soothe your ears with different beats that’ll not only provide for more engaging levels, but also provide music to your ears.

* Can your leaps beat your friend’s? Race against your friend for the highest score and show off your achievements through Facebook and Game Center!

* Lots of replay value with unique ways to tackle a level.

* Race against time and set new high scores.

* UNLEASH your creativity and use the level designer to create, play and share your levels with everyone!
